titleStmt.title: The copie of the French kings priuie councells sentence geuen at Moulyns in Bourbonnois betwene the Lordes of Guyse, and the Lord Admirall of Fraunce the 29. of Ianuary. 1566. Translated out of French into Englishe, by Iohn de Hennot Normand, at the request of certaine gentlemen.

The copie of the French kings priuie councells sentence geuen at Moulyns in Bourbonnois betwene the Lordes of Guyse, and the Lord Admirall of Fraunce the 29. of Ianuary. 1566. Translated out of French into Englishe, by Iohn de Hennot Normand, at the request of certaine gentlemen.
titleStmt.author: Hennot, John de.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Day, dwelling ouer Aldersgate beneath saint Martins,

notesStmt.note: Concerning the murder of the Duke of Guise.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

person.persName: Coligny, Gaspard de, seigneur de Chatillon,
